thread.title: PM Narendra Modi calls on President Mukherjee in backdrop of demonetisation drive | The Indian Express
thread.title_full: PM Narendra Modi calls on President Mukherjee in backdrop of demonetisation drive | The Indian Express

title: PM Narendra Modi calls on President Mukherjee in backdrop of demonetisation drive | The Indian Express
text:
PM Narendra Modi calls on President Mukherjee in backdrop of demonetisation drive PM Narendra Modi calls on President Mukherjee in backdrop of demonetisation drive Proceedings in Parliament have been stalled for the past three days By: ANI | New Delhi | Published:November 19, 2016 11:51 am New Delhi: Prime Minister Narendra Modi calling on President Pranab Mukherjee (Representational image). PTI Photo/RB( 
Prime Minister Narendra Modi called on President Pranab Mukherjee on Friday evening, even as a raging debate over the implementation of the governmentâ€™s demonetisation exercise reached its peak in parliament. 
Sources said the meeting lasted for around 45 minutes, but did not divulge the issues discussed between the two. 
Prime Minister Modi is believed to have briefed President Mukherjee on the developments that have taken place in the aftermath of the launch of the demonetisation drive. 
Proceedings in Parliament have been stalled for the past three days due to the treasury and the opposition trading verbals over the demonetisation decision. Best of Express
